title: Felder AD 7-41 16″ (410 mm) Jointer-Planer / Planer (Includes Straight-Knife Cutterhead, Fence & Table-Extensions)
item_description:
• Make: Felder 
  • Model: AD 7-41
  • Serial No.: 79-01/147-97
  • Year Built: 1997 (Hall, Austria)
  • Motor: 3.0 HP (2.2 kW), 230 V, single-phase, 60 Hz
  • Jointer Capacity: 410 mm (16 1⁄8″) width
  • Table length: 67″ (170 cm)
  • Planer Capacity" 404 mm (16″) width • Up to 225 mm (8 7⁄8″) thickness*
  • Cutterhead: 2-knife straight-knife Felder System cutterblock (410 mm)
  • Feed System: 2-speed synchronised gear box
  • Fence: 1 150 mm (45″) tilting fence plate
  • Height Control: Hand-crank knife elevation • Digital thickness indicator (inch)
  • Table Extensions: (2) bolt-on cast-iron, 5 ½″ × 19 ½″ each
  • Dust Collection: 410 mm vacuum hood / dust chute
  • Controls & Safety: E-System US control transformer with soft-start & electric brake, main isolator, emergency stop, limit switches,
  • Euro planer guard
  • Footprint:
    • With: 35″ (without extensions)
    • Height: 45″ 

*Thickness capacity taken from Felder’s published spec for the AD 7-41 series; verify for your application.

  • Included with the Machine
    • Vacuum hood, Euro-standard planer guard, and fence
    • Digital position control gauge for thickness setting (inch scale)
    • Original operating manuals, tool kit, sticker set, and delivery paperwork (1996 order / 1997 delivery)
    • All switches, limit switches, and safety interlocks as shipped from Felder
